title: Science Knowledge Structuring Learning Through Automated Concept Map Generation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, requiring reinforcement of practical scientific knowledge for professional experts.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze relationships between science topics with 80% accuracy using auto-generated concept maps
Learners can integrate new scientific information with existing knowledge by creating 3+ connection points based on concept map hierarchies
Learners can self-directedly reconstruct science concepts using concept map navigation tools in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
